snippet.title: Comic-Con 2010: Penn & Teller discuss their videogame 'Desert Bus'.
snippet.description: Penn & Teller talk about their Sega CD game 'Smoke & Mirrors' at Comic-Con 2010. In particular, they discuss the infamous 'Desert Bus' minigame, in which the player would drive a bus, in realtime, across the country.
